effect.shortEffect: Damage from contact moves is halved. Damage from Fire moves is doubled.
effect.full: Damage from contact moves is halved. Damage from Fire moves is doubled.

description.sun-moon: Halves the damage taken from moves that make direct contact, but doubles that of Fire-type moves.
description.ultra-sun-ultra-moon: Halves the damage taken from moves that make direct contact, but doubles that of Fire-type moves.
description.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee: Halves the damage taken from moves that make direct contact, but doubles that of Fire-type moves.
description.sword-shield: Halves the damage taken from moves that make direct contact, but doubles that of Fire-type moves.
